short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Raise money for charity with every new browser tab you open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to support a good cause but don't have the time or money to donate?

Tabby is an easy and safe way to raise charitable donations without spending any of your money or time. Replace your new tab page with a charity search page and start raising funds to your favorite charity organization with every new tab opened.

Every time you open a new tab, you will see the Tabby web page with some additional banner ads. Our advertisers deliver these banner ads to raise funds for your favorite nonprofit. You see some ads and your charity receives the income create from it! 

Add Tabby to Chrome and start raising funds for your favorite charity today! Itâ€™s as simple as opening up a new tab on your browser every day. We make it easy by automatically setting up the homepage of your browser so all you have to do is surf online like you are used to. 

Your privacy is important to us; We do not collect any personal information that is not required for this service's to function properly. We do not track your websites history or sell your data.

Your new Tabby page includes an easy search option, shows current time and allows you to keep track of your tabs donation.

Learn more about us at https://www.tabbyproject.com
